mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_CODE td , TB_Work_Report tw Left Join TB_Order tr on tw.Order_ID = tr.Order_ID WHERE User_id = #{userId} AND tw.Work_CD = td.CD_ID
AND DATE_FORMAT(Work_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d') = #{searchDt}
ORDER BY Work_Report_Seq DESC
SELECT IFNULL(A.Work_Report_Seq, 0)+1 FROM ( SELECT max(Work_Report_Seq) Work_Report_Seq FROM TB_Work_Report ) A
